articles.description: July seems to be a big month for phone launches in the country. OnePlus, Samsung, Realme, Oppo, iQoo and Nothing are set to launch new phones during the month in India.  OnePlus will launch addition to its popular Nord series, Realme to Narzo and Samsung to M…
articles.content: On July 4, iQoo is set to introduce the iQoo Neo 7 Pro, its latest mid-range smartphone, in India. The smartphone will be conveniently accessible online through the Amazon India website. Powered by t… [+246 chars]
